price: ߊ߲ ߞߊ߬‹ ߟߎߕߌ߫ › ߟߊߘߏ߲߬ ߒ߬ ߠߊ߫ ߤߌߣߊ ߞߣߐ߫ ، ߓߊߏ߬ ߡߐ߰ ߢߌߡߊ ߟߎ߬ ߘߏ߫ ߟߋ߬
arabic: وَأَدۡخَلۡنَٰهُ فِي رَحۡمَتِنَآۖ إِنَّهُۥ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wa-adkhalnāhu fī raḥmatinā innahu mina al-ṣāliḥīna
